使用两步验证登录，验证通过

PUT.desc: 证书登录切换到密码登录
密码登录切换到证书登录

密码登录
使用两步验证登录，验证通过
没有输入两步验证验证码

data.msg: Please input two factor auth token

POST.desc:
创建证书认证的用户

        extra 中 password 是证书的密码，token 是证书下载用的，见证书下载 api

request.data:
{
    "username": "foobar",
    "comment": "test",
    "authentication_method": "cert",
    "permissions": [
        "System Monitor",
        "System Management",
        "User Management",
        "Website And Security Policy Management",
        "Audit Log Management"
    ],
    "ip_policy": []
}

POST.desc: 创建 ldap 认证的用户

request.data:
{
    "username": "foobar",
    "comment": "test",
    "authentication_method": "ldap",
    "permissions": [
        "System Monitor",
        "System Management",
        "User Management",
        "Website And Security Policy Management",
        "Audit Log Management"
    ],
    "ip_policy": []
}

POST.desc:
创建密码认证的用户

        密码是随机生成的

request.data:
{
    "username": "foobar",
    "comment": "test",
    "authentication_method": "password",
    "permissions": [
        "System Monitor",
        "System Management",
        "User Management",
        "Website And Security Policy Management",
        "Audit Log Management"
    ],
    "ip_policy": []
}

{
    "id": 36,
    "is_locked": false,
    "ip_policy": [],
    "last_login": null,
    "username": "foobar",
    "comment": "test",
    "tfa_enabled": false,
    "create_time": "1544513498",
    "last_update_time": "1544513498",
    "last_login_time": null,
    "last_change_password_time": "1544513498",
    "permissions": [
        "System Management",
        "User Management",
        "Website And Security Policy Management",
        "System Monitor",
        "Audit Log Management"
    ],
    "authentication_method": "cert",
    "session_timeout_time": 172800
}

GET.desc: 获取所有的 api token 和描述

启用 tfa，需要输入一个 app 上生成的验证码

GET.desc: 获取验证码链接，前端需要生成二维码，然后使用 app 扫描添加
查询一个用户名是否被占用

POST.desc: mario 发送 acl 访问统计数据
minion 发送 acl 日志统计数据

GET.desc: 查询 acl 日志统计数据

DELETE.desc: 清空 acl rule template 的所有目标

POST.desc: 创建 acl rule

GET.desc: 获取 acl template 的 acl rule

POST.desc: 创建规则（封禁已知用户）
创建自动封禁规则 （封禁符合条件的用户）
mario 创建 acl rule
创建 cidr 类型的 acl 白名单
创建 session 类型的 acl 白名单

插件创建 acl 规则

         - name match_method action expire_period template_type 一致的话，会复用已有的 template id
         - IP/Session 存在白名单或者已经存在某条规则的时候会自动跳过
创建一个告警订阅

PUT.desc: 已经配置过 smtp 密码的情况下，编辑可以不再次输入密码

POST.desc: 测试 smtp 配置
创建备份

request.data:
{
    "options": [
        "Alarm Subscription",
        "Mario Plugin",
        "SMTP Config",
        "Report Subscription",
        "Syslog Template",
        "Alarm Threshold",
        "User"
    ],
    "comment": "导出测试",
    "sync": true
}

GET.desc:
获取服务器控制的配置的详情

        可以添加 ?type=xx 获取单项配置

types.description: Manage user info, credentials and permissions, etc.
Manage website, security policy, detection log, etc.
View system monitor data, like CPU, memory, disk, network, node load, etc.
Manage some global settings, like SMTP, LDAP, time, license, etc.
Forward request log to your server

Detailed info of attack detection log, such as request header, payload, etc. You can delete old data to save disk space

partition_config_list.description: User operation log and system service log

choices.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

request.data:
{
    "id": 7,
    "name": "互联网客户",
    "modules_state": true,
    "response_detection_state": true,
    "response_detection_max_body_size": 1024,
    "request_detection_max_body_size": 1024,
    "is_timeout_enabled": true,
    "detection_timeout_threshold": 1000,
    "log_detection_timeout_event": true,
    "forbidden_page_config": {
        "path": "",
        "action": "response",
        "status_code": 403
    },
    "modules_detection_config": {
        "m_xss": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "detect_complete_html": true
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_csrf": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_java": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "detect_upload_file": true
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_rule": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "info_leak_types": [
                    "test file",
                    "backup file",
                    "code repository",
                    "server sensitive file"
                ],
                "check_info_leak_by_rsp": false
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_sqli": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "detect_non_injection_sql": true
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_ssrf": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_scanner": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "robot_types": [
                    "scanner"
                ]
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_response": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "error_types": [
                    "directory indexing",
                    "SQL execution error",
                    "server exception"
                ]
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_file_upload": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_file_include": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_cmd_injection": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_php_unserialize": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_java_unserialize": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        },
        "m_php_code_injection": {
            "state": "enabled",
            "detect_config": {
                "detect_upload_file": true
            },
            "low_risk_action": "continue",
            "high_risk_action": "continue",
            "medium_risk_action": "continue",
            "low_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "high_risk_enable_log": 1,
            "medium_risk_enable_log": 1
        }
    },
    "misc_detection_config": {
        "decode_config": {
            "decode_methods": [
                "url decode",
                "JSON",
                "base64",
                "hex",
                "eval",
                "XML",
                "PHP deserialize",
                "utf7"
            ]
        }
    }
}
